name: Pixel Block Down Rapid Roll
description:
keep it up don't fall or hit the top block

a simple full offline arcade game that does not require internet access, with simple controls and a small size, like the classic version but with unique and amazing variants.

your task is to maintain the position of the character in the form of a box, in the classic version is a rapid and roll ball, do not let it hit the pile of needles while taking coins as a condition to open the next level and to unlock new characters

the music in each level is also different with different playing styles, and different high scores, score is also used as a requirement to unlock the next level

* CONTROL *

A and D for Move Left and Right

Left and Right Arow For Move Left and Right

Hold Left Mouse Button and move left or right

Suport Touch Screen
